data.text:
1. WHO ARE WE AND WHAT CAN YOU FIND HERE?

1.1. This website (hereinafter referred to as “Website“) uses cookies and similar technologies.

1.2. This Cookie Policy provides information about what the cookies are and how we, JIC, an Association of Legal Entities, with its registered office at Purkyňova 649/127, Medlánky, 612 00 Brno, Company ID: 711 80 478, use the cookies.

2. WHAT ARE COOKIES?

Cookies are short text files which the visited website sends into the visitor’s browser. Thanks to cookies, the controller can distinguish you from other users and store information about your visit on his website and behaviour more effectively. Cookies are not damaging for your device or its software in any way. As a user, you can reduce or entirely turn off cookies in your browser.

We utilize cookies for many purposes, which include:

ensuring the proper functioning of the Website,

saving of user’s preferences,

analysis of the number of visits for Website improvement purposes and

marketing purposes.

3. WHAT COOKIE CATEGORIES DO WE USE?

We use the following cookie categories on this Website:

Essential cookies, which are necessary for fulfilment of Website’s fundamental functioning and provision of services. Essential cookies are automatically placed into your computer or other devices when you either enter the website or use any of its functions.

Preference cookies, which affect the looks and behaviour of the Website.

Statistic cookies, which are used for analysis of usage of Website’s functions and services by the visitor.

Marketing cookies, which are used for display of ads relevant for Website’s particular visitor. These cookies are more valuable for third parties than for us, therefore, they mostly consist of third-party cookies.

4. COOKIES USED ON THE WEBSITE

A. ESSENTIAL COOKIES

We use essential cookies for the purpose of enabling suitable conditions for the Website’s fundamental functioning like its navigation or its part secured by log-in. Specifically, we use the following cookies:

You cannot disallow essential cookies. Without them, the Website would not work properly.

B. PREFERENCE COOKIES

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website looks or behaves, like your region or your preferred language.

C. STATISTICS COOKIES

Statistics cookies are mainly used by Google Analytics services. The Google Analytics service uses cookies to analyse usage of the Website for the purposes of improving its functioning. The information generated by cookie files about your usage of the Website will be transferred and stored by the Google, Inc. company on its servers. All data obtained by the aforementioned method will be processed anonymously and will be used solely for the purpose of evaluation of the Website’s functioning. The anonymity is ensured by an obligation of Google, Inc. not to link your IP address with any other data that this company might have stored about you. Furthermore, no other data than mentioned in this paragraph will be sent to Google, Inc. (e.g. email, name or phone number). More information regarding Google, Inc.’s statistic cookie utilization can be found on https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/6004245.

D. MARKETING COOKIES

Marketing cookies are used for the identification of particular visitors across multiple websites. These cookies allow the display of relevant ads for particular visitors and transfer of the marketing cookie files themselves to operators of displayed ads. Therefore, marketing cookies are most valuable for third-party advertisers. We primarily utilize Facebook, Google AdWords, LinkedIn, YouTube, Google AdSense and Google DoubleClick services for these purposes.

We will save these cookies on your device only if you allow us to do so in the cookie banner or your web browser.

5. DO YOU WANT TO CHANGE YOUR COOKIE PREFERENCES?

If you change your mind and do not want us to use preference, statistics or marketing cookies, you can change your preferences in your web browser. For more information, you can see the following links:

Internet Explorer: https://support.microsoft.com

Google Chrome: https://support.google.com

Mozilla Firefox: https://support.mozilla.org

Microsoft Edge: https://support.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge

Opera: https://help.opera.com

Safari: https://support.apple.com/
